va-dependency-and-indemnity-compensation: Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) for Parent
Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) for Parent
Tax-free financial assistance may be available to surviving family members of a service member or a veteran.
The deceased served in the active military, naval, or air service.
discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
died as a result of a service-connected disability/illness
died while receiving/eligible for VA compensation
